Annual mean enhancements to CH 4 shortwave forcings and reflected fluxes by clouds from the CSIRO Mk3-6-0 (
56 ) ESM.
div.p: ( A) Difference in CH 4 forcing at the tropopause between all-sky and clear-sky aerosol-free tropospheric conditions. ( B) TOA near-infrared cloud radiative effect. ( C) Area-weighted cumulative probability distribution of cloud-radiative enhancements. Dotted lines denote the point where the forcing exceeds 0, dashed lines denote where the forcing equals the annual mean global all-sky forcing ( Table 2), and the circle and cross (plus) symbols and labels denote the mean (maximum) forcing value.
